messages.content: अँप वापरण्या बद्धल पूर्ण माहिती मिळावी
messages.en: Get complete information about using the app
messages.standalone_question: Could you provide complete information about using the app?
messages.standalone_en: Could you provide complete information about using the app?
messages.content_transliterated: amp vaparanya baddhal purn mahiti milavi

messages.content:
फायलो अँप वापरण्याबद्दल माहिती मिळवण्यासाठी, खालील गोष्टींचा विचार करा:

1. **अँप डाउनलोड आणि इन्स्टॉलेशन**:
   - फायलो अँप Google Play Store किंवा Apple App Store वरून डाउनलोड करा.
   - अँप इन्स्टॉल केल्यानंतर, आपला मोबाइल नंबर किंवा ई-मेल आयडी वापरून लॉगिन करा.

2. **मुख्य मेनू**:
   - अँप उघडल्यानंतर, मुख्य मेनूवर "≡" (हॅम्बर्गर मेनू) वर क्लिक करा.
   - येथे तुम्हाला विविध पर्याय जसे की "माझा शेत", "फर्टिगेशन", "पेस्ट कंट्रोल", "आवश्यकता" इत्यादी दिसतील.

3. **फर्टिगेशन शेड्यूल**:
   - "माझा शेत" वर क्लिक करा.
   - "फर्टिगेशन" पर्यायावर टॅप करा.
   - तुम्हाला आवश्यक फर्टिलायझरच्या अॅप्लिकेशन्सची माहिती मिळेल.

4. **फसल स्टेज अपडेट**:
   - फसल स्टेज अपडेट करण्यासाठी, "फसल" पर्यायावर जा.
   - आवश्यक स्टेज निवडा आणि अपडेट करा.

5. **सपोर्ट**:
   - अँपमध्ये सपोर्ट पर्याय उपलब्ध आहे. तुम्ही ग्राहक सेवा टीमशी संपर्क साधू शकता.
   - हेल्पलाइन नंबर: (+91) 9380908040 किंवा ई-मेल: contact@fyllo.in.

6. **अँप आवृत्ती तपासणे**:
   - हॅम्बर्गर मेनूवर जा आणि स्क्रोल करून अँप आवृत्ती तपासा.

अधिक माहिती किंवा विशिष्ट प्रश्नांसाठी, कृपया ग्राहक सेवा टीमशी संपर्क साधा.
messages.en:
To get information about using the Filo app, consider the following:

1. **App Download and Installation**:
   - Download the Filo app from Google Play Store or Apple App Store.
   After installing the app, login using your mobile number or e-mail ID.

2. **Main menu**:
   After opening the app, click "≡" (Hamburger menu) on the main menu.
   - Here you will see various options such as "My Farm", "Fertigation", "Pest Control", "Requirements", etc.

3. **Fertigation Schedule**:
   - Click on "My Farm".
   - Tap the "Fertigation" option.
   - You will get information about the applications of fertilizer required.

4. **Crop Stage Update**:
   - To update the crop stage, go to the "crop" option.
   - Select and update the required stage.

5. **Support**:
   - There is a support option available in the app. You can contact the customer service team.
   - Helpline Number: (+91) 9380908040 or e-mail: contact@fyllo.in.

6. **Checking the app version**:
   - Go to the Hamburger menu and scroll and check the app version.

For more information or specific questions, please contact the customer service team.

messages.content: મગફળીમાં પાંદડા બળવાનું કારણ શું<user uploaded image for analysis at 'khejadavalu/2025-07-10-1752155089523.jpg'>
messages.en: What caused the burning of leaves in peanuts<user uploaded image for analysis at 'khejadavalu/2025-07-10-1752155089523.jpg'>
messages.standalone_question: What causes the leaves of peanuts to burn?
messages.standalone_en: What causes the leaves of peanuts to burn?
messages.content_transliterated: magaphaliman pandada balavanun karan shu<user uploaded image for analysis at 'khejadavalu/2025-07-10-1752155089523.jpg'>

messages.content:
મગફળીના પાંદડા બળવાના કારણો તરીકે, પાંદડા પરના લક્ષણો અને સ્વાસ્થ્યના આધારે, અહીં કેટલીક સ્પ્રે વિકલ્પો આપવામાં આવી છે:

1. **વિકલ્પ 1:**
   - **Flupyradifurone 17.09% SL**: 2 મીલીલિટર
   - **Chlorothalonil**: 2 ગ્રામ

2. **વિકલ્પ 2:**
   - **Bifenthrin 8% + Clothianidin 10% SC**: 1 મીલીલિટર
   - **Carbendazim 12% + Mancozeb 63%**: 2 ગ્રામ

3. **વિકલ્પ 3:**
   - **Chlorantraniliprole 18.5% SC + Thiamethoxam 25% WG**: 0.5 મીલીલિટર
   - **Propiconazole**: 1 મીલીલિટર

આ સ્પ્રે ફંગલ સંક્રમણો અને પેસ્ટ સમસ્યાઓને અસરકારક રીતે નિયંત્રિત કરવામાં મદદ કરશે. શ્રેષ્ઠ પરિણામો માટે ભલામણ કરેલ માત્રા અને લાગુ કરવાની પદ્ધતિઓનું પાલન કરવું સુનિશ્ચિત કરો. સારવાર પછી પાકને નજીકથી મોનિટર કરવાનું પણ ધ્યાન રાખો.
messages.en:
As reasons for the burning of peanut leaves, depending on the symptoms and health on the leaves, here are some spray options:

1. **Option 1:**
   - **Flupyradifurone 17.09% SL**: 2 milliliters
   - **Chlorothalonil**: 2 grams

2. **Option 2:**
   - **Bifenthrin 8% + Clothianidin 10% SC**: 1 millilitre
   - **Carbendazim 12% + Mancozeb 63%**: 2 g

3. **Option 3:**
   - **Chlorantraniliprole 18.5% SC + Thiamethoxam 25% WG**: 0.5 millilitre
   - **Propiconazole**: 1 millilitre

This spray will help in effectively controlling fungal infections and paste problems. Make sure to follow the recommended doses and methods of application for best results. Also take care to monitor the crop closely after treatment.

messages.content: વરસાદ નું સેન્સર કામ કરતું નથી
messages.en: The rain sensor doesn't work
messages.standalone_question: The sensor for the rain is not working.
messages.standalone_en: The sensor for the rain is not working.

faq:
Q: What should I do if the rain gauge is not working?
A: Open the top cover of the rainfall sensor and clean it as suggested in the maintenance section.

Q: Sensor is showing dry, but it rained recently.
A: Rainwater doesn't percolate well in the soil. Most of it runs off. After a day of rain stops , if the sensor is still dry, you will have to irrigate. You can check the moisture by digging near the sensor . Irrigate accordingly.

Q: What should I do if the soil moisture sensor always shows dry values?
A: Check if irrigation water is reaching the sensor, verify sensor connection, and ensure the sensor is not damaged.

Q: Sensor is showing wet, i.e. less kpa but soil looks dry.
A: The sensor measures the moisture around the rootzone which is not visible from the top. Ask use to check the moisture in rootzone around the sensor. If it matches, ask the user to irrigate.

Q: How do I know if my soil  moisture sensor is working fine ?
A: The only way to know is if after irrigation the sensor is dropping below 5 kpa and increasing continuously unless next irrigation is done. You can try putting water on the sensor and it should drop. Also, there should not be any fluctuations in the soil moisture data and the pressure kpa should always be increasing. Also, a soil moisture reading of 0 kPa is perfectly fine, meaning wet soil, but a reading of 200 kPa could mean fault. If the soil moisture sensor reading is consistently at 0 from few 48 hours, then it could be anamolous (use live and historical hourly soil moisture data (use tool) to validate).

messages.content_transliterated: varsad nu sensor calm karatun nathi

messages.content:
વરસાદનું સેન્સર કામ ન કરતું હોય તો, કૃપા કરીને નીચેના પગલાંઓ અનુસરો:

1. **સેન્સરનું ટોપ કવર ખોલો**: સેન્સરનું ટોપ કવર ખોલીને તેને સાફ કરો. ક્યારેક ધૂળ અથવા અન્ય અવરોધો સેન્સરનું કાર્ય અટકાવી શકે છે.

2. **સેન્સર કનેક્શન ચકાસો**: ખાતરી કરો કે સેન્સરનું કનેક્શન યોગ્ય રીતે છે અને તે યોગ્ય રીતે કાર્ય કરી રહ્યું છે.

3. **સેન્સરનું નિરીક્ષણ કરો**: જો સેન્સર જૂનું છે (બે વર્ષથી વધુ), તો તે ખોટું થઈ શકે છે. 

જો આ પગલાંઓ પછી પણ સમસ્યા યથાવત રહે, તો હું ટેકનિકલ સપોર્ટ માટે ટિકિટ ઉઠાવી શકું છું. શું તમે ટિકિટ ઉઠાવવા માંગો છો?
messages.en:
If the rain sensor is not working, please follow the steps below:

1. **Open the top cover of the sensor**: Open the top cover of the sensor and clean it. Sometimes dust or other obstructions can stop the work of the sensor.

2. **Check sensor connection**: Make sure that the sensor connection is correctly and it is working properly.

3. **Observe the sensor**: If the sensor is old (more than two years), it may go wrong. 

If the problem persists even after these steps, I can pick up the ticket for technical support. Do you want to pick up the ticket?

messages.content: અમે ટીકીટ ઉઠવિસે પરંતુ કોઈ સોલ્યુશન આવ્યું નથી

messages.standalone_en: Have you received any solutions after raising the ticket?

messages.content:
મને ખેદ છે કે તમને કોઈ સોલ્યુશન મળ્યું નથી. હું ટેકનિકલ સપોર્ટ માટે એક નવી ટિકિટ ઉઠાવી શકું છું. 

કૃપા કરીને મને જણાવો કે તમે કઈ સમસ્યાને ઉઠાવવા માંગો છો, જેથી હું યોગ્ય ટિકિટ ઉઠાવી શકું.
messages.en:
I'm sorry you didn't get a solution. I can pick up a new ticket for technical support. 

Please tell me what problem you want to raise so that I can pick up the right ticket.

messages.content: पानावर डाग पडलेले आहेत यासाठी काय करावे लागेल<user uploaded image for analysis at 'bananaplot1698/2025-07-10-1752140712206.jpg'>
messages.en: What needs to be done to make sure there are spots on the page<user uploaded image for analysis at 'bananaplot1698/2025-07-10-1752140712206.jpg'>
messages.standalone_question: What should I do if there are stains on the leaves?
messages.standalone_en: What should I do if there are stains on the leaves?
messages.content_transliterated: panavar dag padalele ahet yasathi kay karave lagel<user uploaded image for analysis at 'bananaplot1698/2025-07-10-1752140712206.jpg'>

messages.content:
पानावर डाग पडलेले असल्यास, खालील उपाययोजना करा:

1. **फंगिसाइडचा वापर**: पानांच्या डागांच्या रोगांवर लक्ष केंद्रित करणारे योग्य फंगिसाइड वापरा. क्लोरोथालोनिल किंवा कॉपर आधारित फंगिसाइड्स वापरण्याचा विचार करा.

2. **संस्कृती पद्धती**: चांगल्या हवेच्या प्रवाहासाठी झाडांमध्ये योग्य अंतर ठेवा आणि रोगग्रस्त पानं काढून टाका, ज्यामुळे रोगाचा प्रसार कमी होईल.

3. **पोषण व्यवस्थापन**: झाडांना पुरेसे पोषण मिळत आहे याची खात्री करा, विशेषतः पोटॅशियम, जे रोगांवर प्रतिकार वाढवण्यास मदत करू शकते.

4. **नियमित निरीक्षण**: झाडांवर आणखी लक्षणे दिसल्यास लक्ष ठेवा आणि रोग पसरल्यास त्वरित उपाययोजना करा.

जर तुम्ही अधिक स्पष्ट चित्र किंवा झाडांच्या अवस्थेबद्दल अधिक माहिती देऊ शकत असाल, तर मी आणखी मदत करू शकतो.
messages.en:
If the page is stained, take the following measures:

1. **Use of fungicide**: Use the right fungicide that focuses on leaf stain diseases. Consider using chlorothalonil or copper-based fungicides.

2. **Culture method**: Keep proper distance between trees and remove diseased leaves for better air flow, which will reduce the spread of disease.

3. **Nutrition Management**: Make sure plants are getting enough nutrition, especially potassium, which can help increase resistance to diseases.

4. **Regular observation**: Monitor the trees if they show any more symptoms and take immediate action if the disease spreads.

If you can give a more clear picture or more information about the condition of the trees, I can help.

messages.content: पिक कॅलेंडर डावूनलोड कसे करावे
messages.en: How to load a pick calendar
messages.standalone_question: How to download a calendar app?
messages.standalone_en: How to download a calendar app?

messages.content:
पिक कॅलेंडर डाउनलोड करण्यासाठी, कृपया आपल्या स्थानिक कृषी कार्यालयाशी संपर्क साधा किंवा त्यांच्या वेबसाइटवर जा. तिथे तुम्हाला तुमच्या क्षेत्रातील पिकांच्या लागवडीसाठी आवश्यक माहिती मिळेल. 

तुम्हाला अधिक मदतीची आवश्यकता असल्यास, कृपया सांगा!
messages.en:
To download the crop calendar, please contact your local agriculture office or visit their website. There you will find the information required for the cultivation of crops in your area. 

If you need more help, please let me know!

messages.content: फायलो अॅप मधील पिक कॅलेंडर डावूनलोड कसे करावे
messages.en: How to download the pic calendar in the Filo app
messages.standalone_question: How can I download the crop calendar from the Philo app?
messages.standalone_en: How can I download the crop calendar from the Philo app?

faq:
Q: How can I reset or restart the Fyllo crop stage on the app?
A: For Hindi instructions, please watch this video: [फसल की स्टेज कैसे अपडेट करे ?](https://youtu.be/Gx2XUOGqNoA) (Thumbnail: https://img.youtube.com/vi/Gx2XUOGqNoA/mqdefault.jpg). For English instructions, please watch this video: [How to update crop stages in App?](https://youtu.be/knCXf0vdN7k) (Thumbnail: https://img.youtube.com/vi/knCXf0vdN7k/mqdefault.jpg). For additional info, contact the CRM team: You can contact customer support by calling the helpline number at (+91) 9380908040 or by emailing contact@fyllo.in.
Make sure to give both hindi and english links.

messages.content_transliterated: phayalo app madhil pic calendar davunalod kase karave

messages.content:
फायलो अॅपमधील पिक कॅलेंडर डाउनलोड करण्यासाठी, कृपया खालील चरणांचे पालन करा:

1. **फायलो अॅप उघडा**.
2. **"माझा फार्म"** या पर्यायावर क्लिक करा.
3. **"पिक कॅलेंडर"** या पर्यायावर जा.
4. तिथे तुम्हाला तुमच्या पिकांसाठी आवश्यक माहिती आणि कॅलेंडर डाउनलोड करण्याचा पर्याय मिळेल.

जर तुम्हाला अधिक मदतीची आवश्यकता असेल, तर कृपया फायलोच्या ग्राहक समर्थनाशी संपर्क साधा.
messages.en:
To download the pick calendar from the Filo app, please follow the steps below:

1. **Open the Filo app**.
2. **Click on the "My Farm"** option.
3. Go to the **"pick calendar"**.
4. There you will get the option to download the information and calendar required for your crops.

If you need more help, please contact Filo's customer support.

messages.content: Present condition spray for this plot
messages.en: Present condition spray for this plot
messages.standalone_question: What is the current condition of the spray for this plot?
messages.standalone_en: What is the current condition of the spray for this plot?

tools:
check_spray_conditions  
Gets the spray condition forecast for the next few hours for the farmer's plots and returns the condition for each hour as GOOD, MODERATE, or WORST, based on deltaT, VPD, and rainfall conditions.
faq:
Q: I already took spray for this pest, but it is still showing high prediction/chances, why?
A: Taking a spray does not affect the prediction calculation. If you have already sprayed based on the fyllo notification,
   then wait a few days, if the fyllo app still recommends spray, only then spray again. Don't give any other reasons.

messages.content: There are no scheduled spray recommendations for today for your plot "Shashidhar thomson 3 acar." You can monitor the situation and spray if necessary based on the pest conditions.
messages.en: There are no scheduled spray recommendations for today for your plot "Shashidhar thomson 3 acar." You can monitor the situation and spray if necessary based on the pest conditions.

messages.standalone_en: Is this plot in good condition?

messages.content:
Your plot "Shashidhar thomson 3 acar" is currently in the "CANE_MATURITY" stage for grapes, which is a crucial phase for growth. The soil type is sandy loam, which is generally good for grape cultivation. 

If you have specific concerns about soil health, moisture levels, or pest issues, please let me know, and I can provide more detailed insights or recommendations!

messages.content: Would you like me to calculate the irrigation hours for your plot "Shashidhar thomson 3 acar"? If so, I can retrieve your plot's irrigation settings and perform the calculation. Please confirm!
messages.en: Would you like me to calculate the irrigation hours for your plot "Shashidhar thomson 3 acar"? If so, I can retrieve your plot's irrigation settings and perform the calculation. Please confirm!

messages.content: Yes
messages.en: Yes
messages.standalone_question: Would you like me to calculate the irrigation hours for your plot "Shashidhar thomson 3 acar"?
messages.standalone_en: Would you like me to calculate the irrigation hours for your plot "Shashidhar thomson 3 acar"?

tools:
calculate_irrigation_hours
Calculate the irrigation hours needed for irrigation by the farmer based on the mandatory provided values.
    The formula used is
    (root_width * root_depth * soil_retention * dripper_distance * calc_constant) / dripper_discharge
    where calc_constant = 0.00006784244

get_irrigation_installation_settings
    retrieves the irrigation installation settings in the farmer's plots, can be used to calculate the irrigation hours.
    returns root_width, root_depth, soil_retention, dripper_distance, dripper_discharge

get_irrigation_forecast  
Gives the irrigation requirement forecast for any day, today and beyond. Dates are mandatory. Output is humanized with day of the week and optimal moisture details if suitable.

should_i_give_water  
Checks the current and optimal soil moisture values and decides whether the farmer should give water to the plot now or today.
faq:
Q: How to measure/ calculate irrigation hours /water tank of my plot in fyllo app? How do I calculate irrigation hours for my plot? How to use the irrigation hours calculator?
A: To calculate irrigation hours in the Fyllo app, follow these steps:

1. Open the Fyllo App
2. Go to the home screen
3. Click on the soil moisture-1 sensor
4. Scroll down to find the "Irrigation hours" section
5. Fill in the required details such as:
   - Root width (inches)
   - Root depth (inches)
   - Soil retention (mm)
   - Dripper distance (feet)
   - Dripper discharge (liters)
6. Click the calculate button

Would you like me to calculate the irrigation hours for you right now? I can retrieve your plot's irrigation settings and perform the calculation if you say yes.

Tool Selection: When user says yes, I should:
1. Use get_irrigation_installation_settings tool to retrieve plot settings
2. Check if all values are present and valid
3. If values are valid, use calculate_irrigation_hours tool with these values
4. If values are missing or invalid, ask the user to provide the missing values
5. After calculating irrigation hours, display the irrigation installation settings that were used for the calculation
6. Ask the user if they want to calculate irrigation hours with a different set of values, and if yes, prompt them to provide those values

Example response if values are missing:
"I checked your plot settings, but I need some additional information to calculate irrigation hours accurately. Could you please provide the [missing value(s)]? Once you provide these details, I can complete the calculation for you."

Example response after calculation:
"Based on your plot's irrigation settings, the calculated irrigation hours are [X] hours. 

I used the following settings for this calculation:
- Root width: [value] inches
- Root depth: [value] inches
- Soil retention: [value] mm
- Dripper distance: [value] feet
- Dripper discharge: [value] liters

Would you like to calculate irrigation hours with a different set of values? If yes, please provide the new values you'd like to use."

messages.content:
Based on your plot's irrigation settings, the calculated irrigation hours are approximately **0.01 hours** (or about 36 seconds).

I used the following settings for this calculation:
- Root width: 36 inches
- Root depth: 8 inches
- Soil retention: 6 mm
- Dripper distance: 1 mm (converted to feet: 0.328084)
- Dripper discharge: 4 liters

Would you like to calculate irrigation hours with a different set of values? If yes, please provide the new values you'd like to use.
messages.en:
Based on your plot's irrigation settings, the calculated irrigation hours are approximately **0.01 hours** (or about 36 seconds).

I used the following settings for this calculation:
- Root width: 36 inches
- Root depth: 8 inches
- Soil retention: 6 mm
- Dripper distance: 1 mm (converted to feet: 0.328084)
- Dripper discharge: 4 liters

Would you like to calculate irrigation hours with a different set of values? If yes, please provide the new values you'd like to use.
